Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:You look like someone important, can I assume that you're $Name$? $Actor_20$ told me I should speak with you. It's a cute town you've got here, but I think it could be so much more. I'm $Actor_14$, a Florist by trade and I think I could really help out here. Not only are flowers beautiful but, as I'm sure you know, they have a lot of practical uses!]
[Text:Me going okies today. Bin is comfy, air is fresh. Very happies today][Default][Name:1]
[Text:Why you out in the rain? Is cold! Is wet! Go inside where warm... Do you want to come inside bin? $21$ can scootch over.][Weather:Raining][Name:Raining|1]
[Text:Oh! Oh! Thank! Thank you very muchlike. This makes $21$ very happy!][Name:Gift]
[Text:There be many gremlins running around. We stay just out of sight but try to be helpful when we can.][Default][Name:6]
[Text:Yes? Is very wet outside. No like.][Weather:Raining][Name:Raining|2]
[Name:Snowing|1][Text:Cold! Why so cold? You should go inside, yes. Sleep until Spring.][Weather:Snowing]

[Name:Task_5_Start][Text:I'm pretty excited to get settled in here, and put down some roots if you'll forgive the pun. It's nothing too extravagant, but if you could build this for me, we can get started on beautifying this place.][UnlockObjectID:24]
